paper_abstract: In this letter, we propose a new observer error linearization approach that is called reduced-order dynamic observer error linearization (RDOEL), which is a modified version of dynamic observer error linearization (DOEL). We introduce the concepts and properties of RDOEL, and provide a complete solution to RDOEL with one integrator. Moreover, we show that it is also a complete solution to a simple case of DOEL.
paper_title: A Complete Solution to a Simple Case of Dynamic Observer Error Linearization: New Approach to Observer Error Linearization
